name: Rainbow Station
description:
This game was created at the DigiFest Game Jam in under 48 hours, placing 2nd.

With a team of 3 randomly selected people, consisting of Evan Kiser, Tomas Abrams, and Nicholas Cisneros.

The theme of the Game Jam was 8-bit  Renaissance. Taking Classical games and modifying  them to modern day games.  This game is based off Asteriods!
